name: Firewall (DigNZ)
description:
You downloaded one too many dodgy executables from the internet.

Your computer is struggling under a constant onslaught of malicious data.

Your firewall has been compromised! 

You are left with one button, one chance to save the core...

Built with Godot 3.2
